name: Swiss Army Scout
description: Swiss Army Scout is a short ARPG game about a scout doing favors for a peer. These are perfectly normal favors that any scout would ask of you. This game was made for VimJam 3 and was made using GB Studio, meaning that this game can run on a Game Boy! I'd like to thank Isaac Christopherson for the music and Eleanor Berg for the concept art. Everything else was made by me. I hope you enjoy the game and any feedback is appreciated, thank you!
